mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sauna (name, sauna_temp, sauna_time, sauna_satisfaction, water_temp, water_time, water_satisfaction, created_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{saunaTemp}, #{saunaTime}, #{saunaSatisfaction}, #{waterTemp}, #{waterTime}, #{waterSatisfaction}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE sauna SET name = #{name}, sauna_temp = #{saunaTemp}, sauna_time = #{saunaTime}, sauna_satisfaction = #{saunaSatisfaction}, water_temp = #{waterTemp}, water_time = #{waterTime}, water_satisfaction = #{waterSatisfaction} WHERE id = #{id}
